title: Gta Vice City + Crack (working on Windows 7)
description:
English:

Extract the the archive then mount disc 1 with Daemon Tools or whatever you have and run the setup.exe. After the installation finished, mound disc 2 and copy the gta-vc.exe into your GTA Vice City folder. If you don't have audio in the game, then copy the Audio folder into your GTA Vice City folder. Known bug: sometimes the game still asks you to insert the disc after installing the crack. If this happens just reinstall the crack. If the problem still not solved, then mount disc 2. It always works for me.

This is the same GTA Vice Ctiy torrent I've uploded before, but there were an accident and that torrent is not working anymore.
